mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BUILDER ( F_CLASS_NAME, F_SURROGATE_COUNT, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ className }, #{ surrogateCount }, CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BUILDER SET F_SURROGATE_COUNT = #{ surrogateCount }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = CAST((julianday('now') - 2440587.5) * 86400000 AS INTEGER) WHERE F_CLASS_NAME = #{ className } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_CLASS_NAME AS "className", T1.F_SURROGATE_COUNT AS "surrogateCount", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", '' AS "_title" FROM T_BUILDER T1 WHERE T1.F_CLASS_NAME = #{ className }
